371513613:
◆ New Content ◆
Huge Divergent Universe update! Not only are there new Blessings, Equations, Weighted Curios, and random Occurrences, but also new Golden Blood's Boons.

◆ Content Adjustments ◆
● Adds the new Path of Harmony. Conducts partial fixes to the Paths of Preservation and Abundance. Iterates on certain content for the other Paths.
● The Third Plane newly introduces Boss Enemies Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife (Complete) and Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff (Complete).
● Boss Enemy Argenti (Complete), Swarm: True Sting (Complete), and The Past, Present, and Eternal Show (Complete) will no longer appear in the Third Plane.
● All new Synchronicity Level and Stable Computing Array challenges. Complete them to obtain rewards.

◆ Day/Night and Golden Blood's Boons ◆
● Combat will cycle between Day and Night.
● You can obtain Golden Blood's Boons during the challenge. Golden Blood's Boons will offer powerful buff effects when in the designated Day/Night period.
● Golden Blood's Boons are split between base effects and branched enhancements. They can be enhanced to Lv. 3 at max.

◆ Astronomical Division Mode ◆
● After clearing Ordinary Extrapolation difficulty V, you will unlock Astronomical Division mode, which greatly increases the difficulty.
● Successfully clearing Astronomical Division mode can light Cognoculi and increase your Astronomical Division level. The higher the Astronomical Division, the more Cognoculi are needed.
● After clearing a certain Threshold Protocol in The Human Comedy and reaching a certain Astronomical Division, additional Cognoculi will be lit.
● Certain Astronomical Division are affected by protective mechanisms. Upon reaching certain requirements, failing the run will not lower your Astronomical Division level.

◆ Divergent Universe Strategies ◆
● During the challenge, you can use the strategy guide and get build hints about which Equations and Weighted Curios to obtain, while also being able to switch your lineup with a tap of button.
● During the challenge, you can use "Recommendation" to see guides that suit your current build the best.
● You can view the most popular build through "Hot Strategies."
● You can head to the strategy site to edit and upload your own suggestions and builds.
1370309104: After using the Ultimate, Tribbie can trigger a Follow-up ATK.
